attributes.action: Build Proper Shelters for Police Dogs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the recent deaths of two German Shepard dogs in notts police,We now ask the Prime Minister for every police station to have out door shelters for all police dogs.
The dogs were kept in the back of the police dog car with the boot open and windows down ,however the heat still killed them.
The officers have repsonsabiltys to these animals and we the public urge you to protect the police dogs who are key to the police force.
If an adequate shelter in which would have cooling or warming capabilities would of been available the dogs in question wouldn't of been dead.
Action Is needed.
